Set how long device will be visible for
Disable Bluetooth voice dialing when screen is locked
No name set, using account name
Application requests to turn on Bluetooth. Continue?
%1$s would like to access your contacts and call history. Allow %2$s access?
%s is requesting permission to connect to your messages
The hostname you typed is not valid
Exclusion list is not properly formatted. Enter a comma-separated list of excluded domains
You must complete the port field
The port field must be empty if the host field is empty
The port you typed is not valid
HTTP proxy used by browser but may not be used by other applications
Number of PPP reset since boot:
Changes take effect when USB cable is reconnected
SD card is being used as a mass storage device
It is now safe to remove the SD card
SD card was removed while still in use!

string.name: sdcard_settings_factory_reset_warning
string.li: Key to decrypt files in SD card (Decrypt files in SD card if encrypted)

resources.string: Manage Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, Airplane mode, mobile networks, and VPNs
Connect to data services when roaming
Connect to data services when roaming
You have lost data connectivity because you left your home network with data roaming turned off
Roaming will incur extra charges. Continue?
Set date, time, time zone & formats
Show owner info on lock screen
Enter text to display on lock screen
Set my location, screen unlock, SIM card lock, and credential storage lock
Set my location, screen unlock, and credential storage lock
Charge battery to above 80% and try again
Plug in charger and try again
Set screen unlock password before you can start encryption
Create backup unlock PIN or pattern
Change or disable pattern, PIN, or password
If your face is not recognized, which unlocking method do you want to use?
Disabled by administrator, encryption policy, or credential storage
Password must contain at least %d characters
PIN must contain at least %d numbers
Password must be fewer than %d characters
PIN must be fewer than %d digits
Password must contain at least one letter
Password must contain at least one number
Password must contain at least one symbol
Password must meet requirements. Contact IT administrator
Manage connections, set device name and discoverability
Enter PIN to pair with %s (Try 0000 or 1234)
Enter PIN on other device as well
You may also need to enter this password on other device
Confirm passkey is %2$s to pair with %1$s
Unable to pair with %s. Incorrect PIN or password
To see devices, turn on Bluetooth
%s will be disconnected from media audio
%s will be disconnected from Bluetooth hands-free audio
%s will be disconnected from input device
Internet access via %1$s will be disconnected
Not connected to file transfer server
Connected to device for Internet access
Local Internet connection shared with device
Allow data exchange when device touches another device
Ready to transmit app content via NFC
Android Beam not available. NFC turned off

When this feature is on, you can beam app content to another NFC-capable device by holding the devices close together. For example, you can beam browser pages, YouTube videos, contacts, and more. Just bring the devices together (typically back to back) and then tap your screen. The app determines what is beamed
Set up and manage portable Wi-Fi hotspots
Notify me when an open network is available
Do not use Wi-Fi networks with poor Internet connections
To see available networks, turn on Wi-Fi
WPS in progress. Wait a few seconds for it to complete
Failed to start WPS. Try again.
Network avoided because of poor connection. Disable this setting by going to Settings > Wi-Fi screen > Advanced menu items
Another Wi-Fi protected session detected. Try again in a few minutes
Failed to change Wi-Fi frequency band
Enter network prefix between 0 and 31 characters long
Enable Wi-Fi Direct to set up peer-to-peer connectivity

Wi-Fi Direct enables Wi-Fi devices to connect directly, making printing, file sharing, synchronizing, and screen sharing much simpler and more convenient. Connecting to devices that support Wi-Fi Direct makes it possible to share your content, synchronize your data, socialize with friends, play games, audio, videos, and more, using various applications
There has been no activity for %d minutes since Wi-Fi Direct was enabled. Disabling Wi-Fi Direct can extend battery life. Continue?
Enabling Wi-Fi Direct will disable the portable Wi-Fi hotspot
Connected with %d devices via Wi-Fi Direct
You can connect up to %d devices at the same time
Insert SIM card to use portable Wi-Fi hotspot and tethering
Use incoming call volume for notifications
Set volume for music and videos
Music, video, games, and other media
Audio settings while docked to desktop
Audio settings while docked in car
Play sounds when inserting and removing phone from dock
Do not play sounds when inserting and removing phone from dock
Switch orientation automatically when rotating phone
Switch orientation automatically when rotating phone
Adjust the brightness of the screen
Unable to change PIN. Incorrect PIN may have been entered
Unable to change SIM card lock state. Possibly incorrect PIN
Disconnect SD card, view available storage
Unmount SD card to safely remove it
"Erases all data on device's USB storage, such as music and photos"
Deletes all data on SD card, including music and photos
Unmounting SD card will stop some applications from functioning. Applications may not be available until you mount the SD card again
Unable to unmount SD card. Try later
Allows you to transfer media files in Windows, or using Android file transfer on a Mac (see www.android.com/filetransfer)
Allows you to transfer photos using camera software, and transfer any files onto PC that do not support MTP
The Name field cannot be empty
MNC field must be 2 or 3 digits.
You are currently signed in to the following accounts:
Clear SD card to delete music, pictures, and other user data
Erase all data from USB storage, including music and photos
Erase all data from SD card, including music and photos
Erase all your personal information and downloaded apps? Data cannot be recovered
Draw your unlock pattern to confirm factory data reset
No reset performed. System clear service not available
Erases all data on the SD card
Erase all USB storage? You will lose all stored data
Data cannot be recovered after SD card is cleared. Continue?
Formatting USB storage will delete all data. Data cannot be recovered. Continue?
Formatting SD card will delete all data. Data cannot be recovered. Continue?
Draw your unlock pattern to confirm USB storage format
Draw your unlock pattern to confirm SD card format.
Set up voicemail, call forwarding, call waiting, caller ID
Unable to tether to more than %d devices
Allows apps to use data from sources such as Wi-Fi and mobile networks to determine your approximate location
Allows apps to use GPS to pinpoint your location
Use server to assist GPS (Untick to reduce network usage)
Use server to assist GPS (deselect to improve GPS performance)
Allows Google to use your location data for improved search results and other services
Enhance positioning and save power using sensors
Enhance positioning and save power using sensors

Sensors enhance pedestrian positioning and save battery power. When indoors or underground, sensors work best if handset is aligned with direction of movement. Distorted magnetic fields will affect performance
View legal info, device status, and software version
Learn how to use your phone
You have no data connection. To view this information now, go to %s from any computer connected to the Internet
Connect at least %d dots. Try again:
How to draw an unlock pattern
Manage apps and set up quick launch shortcuts
This app is set to open by default for some actions
This application may not be designed for your screen. You can control how it adjusts to your screen here
"All of this application's data will be deleted permanently. This includes all files, settings, accounts, databases etc."
All updates to this Android system app will be uninstalled
Unable to delete data for app
System updates cannot be installed on external memory
If you force stop an app, it may cause errors
Change the preferred installation location for new apps
Disabling built-in apps may cause errors in other apps
View and control currently running services
Service started by application. Stopping service may cause application to fail
This app cannot be stopped safely. If you stop it, you may lose some of your current work
Old application process kept for better speed in case it is needed again. There is usually no reason to stop it
%s in use. Tap Settings to manage it
Double tap the space bar twice to insert a full stop
This method can collect all of the text you enter, except passwords, including personal data and credit card numbers. It comes from the app %1$s. Use anyway?
No words in user dictionary. Add a word by tapping the add (+) button
Set keyboard shortcuts for opening apps
Your shortcut for %1$s (%2$s) will be deleted
Debugging mode launches when USB is connected
Screen will never sleep while charging
USB debugging is intended for development purposes only. It can be used to copy data between your computer and your device, install applications on your device without notification, and read log data
When explore by touch is enabled, you can hear or see descriptions of what you are touching. This feature is for visually impaired users
TalkBack provides spoken feedback to help visually impaired users. Install it for free from Market?
Allow apps to install scripts from Google that make their Web content more accessible?
This feature changes the way your device responds to touch. Enable?
Battery used when phone is idle
Switch to Airplane mode to save power in areas with no cell coverage
Battery used by display and backlight
Reduce screen brightness and/or screen timeout
Turn off Wi-Fi when not in use or when not available
Turn off Bluetooth when not using it
Control GPS to prevent application from using it manually
Default settings below override app settings
Sets the speech synthesis engine to be used for spoken text
Speed at which the text is spoken
Sets the language for spoken text
Play short demonstration of speech synthesis
Install voice data required for speech synthesis
Voices required for speech synthesis already properly installed
Settings changed. This is an example of how they will sound
Unable to run engine. Components missing
This speech synthesis engine may collect all speech, including passwords, credit card numbers, and other personal data. Continue?
Enter password of at least 8 characters
Incorrect password. One more attempt left before credential storage is cleared
Incorrect password. %1$d attempts left before credential storage cleared
Set screen unlock PIN or password before you can use credential storage
Set function when emergency call is placed
Back up app data, Wi-Fi passwords, and other settings to Google servers
No account is storing backup data currently
When reinstalling an application, backed up settings and data will be restored
Full desktop backups are not currently protected
Select to change or remove password for full desktop backups
Stop backing up Wi-Fi passwords, bookmarks, and other settings and application data and delete all copies from Google servers?
Activating administrator will allow %s to perform following operations
Administrator active. This allows %s to perform the following operations.
Unable to configure EAP Wi-Fi connection during setup. After setup, you can do that by going to Settings > Wireless and networks
Tap Next to continue setup. Tap Back to connect to a different Wi-Fi network
Sync is currently experiencing problems. It will be back shortly.
Applications can always sync, send, and receive data
Disable background data connection to extend battery life and reduce data usage. Some applications may still use the connection
Welcome to Google Sync! A Google approach to synchronizing data to allow access to your contacts, appointments and more from wherever you are
Sync disabled for this item. To enable, turn on background data and automatic sync temporarily
Enter password to decrypt device storage
Unable to save. Service too busy. Try later
Make screen flash when apps perform long operations on main thread
Screen overlay showing current touch data
Show visual feedback for touch interactions
Make areas of screen flash when they update
Screen overlay showing current CPU usage
Destroy every activity as soon as the user leaves it
Show app not responding dialogue for background apps
Change day of the month to reset data usage cycle
No apps used data during this time
Measured by your device. Your service provider may account for data usage differently
Disable background data on mobile data network only. Wi-Fi will be used if available
Restricting background data is only possible when you have set a mobile data limit
This feature may stop apps that depend on background data working when Wi-Fi is not available. You can find more appropriate data usage controls in the individual app settings
Restricting background data is only possible when you have set a mobile data limit

%1$s data connection will be disabled when specified limit is reached. Data usage is measured by your device, and your service provider may account for usage differently, so consider using a conservative limit
Restricting background data will stop some apps and services from working unless device is connected to a Wi-Fi network

After enabling explore by touch, you can touch the screen to learn about what you are touching. For example, the current screen contains app icons. Find one of them by touching the screen and sliding your finger around
Good. Keep swiping your finger around the screen to find at least one more icon
To use something that you touch, tap it. Swipe your finger until you find the %s icon, then tap the icon once to use it
Your finger is touching the %s icon. Tap once to activate icon
Your finger moved over the %s icon, and then moved away. Slowly swipe your finger around the screen until you find the browser icon again
Good. To move to the next lesson, find and tap the %s button, near the bottom-right corner of the screen
To scroll through a list, swipe two fingers up or down the screen. For example, the current screen contains a list of app names. Try to identify a few items in the list by swiping one finger around
Good. Keep swiping your finger around to find at least one more item.
Now place two fingers on an item in the list and swipe both fingers up. If you reach the top of the screen, lift your fingers, place them lower on the list, and continue swiping up
Good. Keep swiping your fingers up to scroll further
End of tutorial. To close, find and tap the %s button
Enter new password for full backups
Enter new full backup password again
Incoming calls and new notifications will be read out automatically
Type a PIN that is 4 to 8 numbers
Insert SIM card to access network services
Save power by analyzing image and adjusting LCD brightness
Only downloadable when connected via Wi-Fi
You can receive software update information via push messages after signing in to Google account
Place device on a level surface and tap Calibrate
Calibrating. Do not move device. Please wait...
Unable to find offset file. Try again
Place device on a level surface and tap Calibrate
Calibrating. Do not move device. Please wait...
Select applications to use TTS while Driving mode is on
"Read out callers' information when receiving incoming calls"
"Read out senders' information and message contents when new messages arrive"
Read out number of new emails received
Notify when new voice mail arrives
Read out alarm information when alarms sound
Read out scheduled alarm information when alarms sound
Read out information about time, missed calls, and unread message information on unlock screen when screen turns on
Use external speakers when device is docked
Adjust the delay before the Touch key light automatically turns off
USB is connected. Remove the cable
To avoid overheating, maximum brightness has been reduced
Tap the button below to copy files between computer and SD card
Connect USB cable to use mass storage
Turn USB debugging off to set USB connection. Tap OK to continue
USB is connected. Remove the cable
Send SMS when SIM card is changed
Add or edit recipients of SIM card changed alert message
Allows phone to be locked, tracked, and data to be wiped remotely
To enable remote controls, register Samsung account
To enable remote controls, register Google account
Enter another phone number (including country code)
Set refresh interval and thermometer units
Network not available. When network available, weather will be displayed on lock screen
Password required to decrypt SD card each time it is connected
Encrypt new files on SD card
New files on SD card will be encrypted
Encrypt all files on SD card
All files on SD card will be encrypted
Multimedia files on SD card will not be encrypted
Do not encrypt multimedia files on SD card
Wait until SD card encryption is completed
Wait until SD card decryption is completed
Device will encrypt new files on SD card
Device will not encrypt new files on SD card
Device will encrypt existing files on SD card
Device will decrypt encrypted SD card
Device will not encrypt multimedia files on SD card
All open files on SD card will be closed
During this process, SD card will not be available
Encryption may take a long time depending on the amount of data. It is recommended that you plug device into charger
Decryption may take a long time depending on the amount of data. It is recommended that you plug device into charger
Error encrypting SD card. Unable to mount SD card
Encryption policies received from remote administrator
Unable to decrypt SD card. Not enough space on card. Approximately %.2f GB needed. Delete some files
Unable to decrypt SD card. Not enough space on card. Approximately %.2f GB needed. Delete some files
Unable to encrypt SD card. Not enough space on card. Approximately %.2f MB needed. Delete some files
Unable to decrypt SD card. Not enough space on card. Approximately %.2f MB needed. Delete some files
Error encrypting SD card. Unable to mount SD card
Error decrypting SD card. Some files may still be encrypted
Tap Continue to mount to SD card
Waiting for SD card encryption or decryption...
Battery life extended but performance restricted, brightness low. Tap Power saving tips for more details
Use default settings for power saving. Settings will be enabled immediately
Use custom settings for power saving. Settings will be enabled when battery level is below the value you set
Turn off Wi-Fi when not connected
Turn off Bluetooth when not in use
Turn off GPS when not in use
Turn off Sync when phone is not synchronizing with server
Adjust the delay before the screen automatically turns off
Custom power saving will be enabled below %d%% battery
Turn off Wi-Fi. Turning off Wi-Fi can extend battery life. However, if you surf the Web frequently, using Wi-Fi can save more battery than using the cellular network
Turn off Bluetooth. Not using Bluetooth headset or Car home mode can extend battery life
Applications using GPS location data reduce battery life. Turning off GPS can extend battery life
Applications such as Gmail, Calendar, and Twitter are auto synced via wireless network at specific intervals. Syncing data manually can extend battery life
Lowering the brightness of the screen can extend battery life. Selecting Automatic brightness will adjust screen brightness to ambient automatically
"Set system functions below 1.Dual core max 2.Brightness 3.UI rendering speed"
1. Disabling Use packet data (Settings > Wireless and networks > Mobile networks) helps extend battery. You cannot receive MMS messages
2. Disabling Auto sync (Settings > Account and sync) helps extend battery
Change text size in following applications:
Turn on torch to see better
Press and hold the power key to use the accessibility shortcut under phone options
Provides mono audio for listening with one earphone
Reduce or enlarge screen in Gallery and Browser
Move icon to another page in Home and Application edit mode
Automatically prepare your device for voice commands in %s
Mute incoming calls and playing sounds
Tap and hold at two points then tilt device back and forth to reduce or enlarge screen
Move device left or right while holding selected icon to reposition it to another page
Shake your device to scan for Bluetooth, Kies air devices, and more
Automatically prepare your device for voice commands in %s
Mute incoming calls and playing sounds by turning phone over (except when screen off)
You can make calls using voice commands such as Call to Joe
Preparing. This could take over %d minutes...
Wait while device is decrypted. ^1% complete.
Decrypt device? Operation irreversible and if you interrupt it, you will lose data. Decryption could take an hour or more, during which device will restart several times

You can decrypt accounts, settings, downloaded applications and their data, media, and other files. Decryption could take an hour or more. Start with a charged battery and keep device plugged in until decryption is completed. Interrupting decryption process may lose some or all data
Set an unlock password of at least 6 characters, containing at least 1 number
If you select this option, only used memory space will be encrypted
%s is requesting permission to connect to access your phone
%s is requesting permission to connect to your Contacts
%s is requesting permission to connect to your phone to transfer objects
%s is requesting permission to connect to your phone to transfer files
%s is requesting permission to connect to your Bluetooth serial port
%s is requesting permission to connect to access SIM
%s is requesting permission to connect to dial-up network
%s is requesting permission to connect to access your phone
Security policy restricts use of Bluetooth connection
Security policy restricts use of Bluetooth connection to hands-free features only
Security policy restricts use of Wi-Fi
%s is requesting permission to connect to your phone to retrieve objects
%s is requesting permission to connect to your phone to send objects
Unable to use Bluetooth when Airplane mode is on
Unable to use Bluetooth in Flight mode
Turn Bluetooth on to use Bluetooth services
Unable to search for devices during call
HID devices not supported on phone
Press any key on the keyboard to connect
Password must contain alphanumeric characters and/or symbols
Password used before. Enter new password
Connected to phone and media audio
Password must contain at least %1$d characters and not exceed %2$d characters
Select time zone prior to setting time
Press the pen button, and tap and hold on the screen. You can capture the screen, draw on it, and share it from anywhere with the pen
With the two gestures below, you can go back to the previous screen or open menus without putting the pen down
To go back, drag the pen from right to left while pressing the pen button. This pen gesture works like the back key
To open menus, drag the pen from the bottom to top while pressing the pen button. This pen gesture works like the menu key
To go to the home screen, drag the pen from the top to bottom while pressing the pen button. This pen gesture works like the home key
Enable adjusting the position of the dialing keypad left or right, for use with one hand
Enable adjusting the position of the Samsung keypad left or right, for use with one hand
Enable adjusting the position of the Samsung calculator keypad left or right, for use with one hand

The one-handed operation settings help you to easily use keypads with only one hand. If you tick one-handed operation, the position of the dialing keypad, Samsung keypad, or Calculator can be adjusted by tapping the arrows on either side of the screen. If you tap the right arrow, the keypad slides left, and if you tap the left arrow, the keypad slides right
The small and tiny font sizes will only be applied to emails and messages
